displayName.schinese: 史帝芬的角色扮演游戏
displayName.tchinese: 小捲毛的角色扮演遊戲

description.english: Learn the ropes!
description.german: Arbeite dich ein!
description.french: Apprends les ficelles du métier !
description.italian: Apprendi le basi!
description.koreana: 요령을 익히세요!
description.spanish: ¡Aprende lo básico!
description.schinese: 初窥门径！
description.tchinese: 抓到訣竅
description.russian: Освоить основы!
description.japanese: コツを覚えよう！
description.turkish: Alışma turları!
description.brazilian: Aprenda as regras!
description.latam: ¡Aprende cómo se juega!

description.english: Defeat 100 Light Constructs
description.german: Besiege 100 Lichtkonstrukte.
description.french: Bats 100 créations lumineuses.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 100 costruzioni di luce
description.koreana: 빛 악당 100명을 물리칩니다
description.spanish: Vence a 100 seres de luz.
description.schinese: 击败100个光团怪
description.tchinese: 擊敗100個光成品
description.russian: Победить 100 световых конструктов.
description.japanese: 100体の光の生成物を倒す
description.turkish: 100 Işık Yapısını yen
description.brazilian: Derrote 100 Constructos de Luz.
description.latam: Derrota a 100 constructos de luz.

displayName.french: C'est un secret pour tout le monde

description.english: Discover a secret room!
description.german: Entdecke einen Geheimraum!
description.french: Découvre une salle secrète !
description.italian: Scopri una sala segreta!
description.koreana: 비밀의 방을 발견하세요!
description.spanish: ¡Descubre una sala secreta!
description.schinese: 发现一个秘密房间！
description.tchinese: 發現一間密室！
description.russian: Открыть секретную комнату!
description.japanese: 秘密の部屋を見つけよう！
description.turkish: Gizli bir oda keşfet!
description.brazilian: Descubra uma sala secreta!
description.latam: ¡Descubre una habitación secreta!

description.english: Perform 10 Perfects in a row (without missing any perfect attacks or blocks)
description.german: Erziele 10 perfekte Treffer hintereinander (ohne einen perfekten Treffer oder einen Block zu verfehlen).
description.french: Réussis 10 Parfaits d'affilée (sans manquer d'attaque ou de blocage parfait).
description.italian: Ottieni 10 Perfetto consecutivi (esegui parate o attacchi perfetti)
description.koreana: 퍼펙트 10개를 연속으로 달성합니다(공격과 차단 모두 퍼펙트 달성)
description.spanish: Realiza 10 ataques perfectos seguidos (sin que se te escape ningún ataque perfecto ni bloqueo).
description.schinese: 连续达成10次“完美”（不能漏掉任何一个完美攻击或格挡）
description.tchinese: 連續執行10次完美行動（未遺漏任何完美攻擊或防禦）
description.russian: Выполнить 10 идеальных блоков или атак подряд (не пропустив ни одной).
description.japanese: 10回連続でパーフェクトを実行する（パーフェクト攻撃やブロックを逃すことなしに）
description.turkish: Arka arkaya 10 Mükemmel hamle yap (mükemmel saldırıları veya blokları kaçırmadan)
description.brazilian: Execute 10 toques perfeitos seguidos (sem perder nenhum ataque ou bloqueio perfeito).
description.latam: Haz 10 ataques perfectos consecutivos (sin errar ningún ataque o bloqueo perfecto).

displayName.japanese: キャプテン・ユニバース

description.english: Hit at least 6 enemies with one Shield Throw
description.german: Triff mindestens 6 Gegner mit einem Schildwurf.
description.french: Touche au moins 6 ennemis avec un seul lancer de bouclier.
description.italian: Colpisci almeno 6 nemici con Lanciascudo
description.koreana: 방패 던지기 한 번으로 적 6명 이상을 때립니다
description.spanish: Golpea al menos a 6 enemigos con un Lanzamiento de Escudo.
description.schinese: 一次盾牌投掷击中至少6名敌人
description.tchinese: 以一招盾牌投擲擊中至少6名敵人
description.russian: Попасть в не менее чем 6 врагов одним броском щита.
description.japanese: 1回の盾投げで最低6人の敵を攻撃する
description.turkish: Tek Kalkan Atma hamlesiyle en az 6 düşmanı vur
description.brazilian: Acerte pelo menos 6 inimigos com um lançamento de escudo.
description.latam: Pégale a al menos 6 enemigos con un Lanzamiento de Escudo.

description.english: Defeat three enemies at once with Lapis' Tidal Wave
description.german: Besiege drei Gegner gleichzeitig mit Lapis' Flutwelle.
description.french: Bats trois ennemis simultanément avec le Raz-de-marée de Lapis.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 3 nemici contemporaneamente con Alta marea di Lapis
description.koreana: 라피스의 해일로 한 번에 적 3개를 물리칩니다
description.spanish: Derrota a tres enemigos al mismo tiempo con el Maremoto de Lapislázuli.
description.schinese: 使用青金石的海啸技能一次击败3名敌人
description.tchinese: 使用璧琉璃的「潮浪沖刷」一次打敗三名敵人
description.russian: Победить трех врагов за раз с помощью приливной волны Ляпис.
description.japanese: ラピスの津波で3人の敵を同時に倒す
description.turkish: Lapis'in Gelgit Dalgası hamlesiyle tek seferde üç düşmanı yen
description.brazilian: Derrote três inimigos de uma só vez com o Tsunami da Lápis.
description.latam: Derrota a tres enemigos a la vez con el Maremoto de Lapis.

description.english: Perform any fusion
description.german: Führe eine Fusion durch.
description.french: Réalise une fusion.
description.italian: Esegui una fusione
description.koreana: 어떤 퓨전이든 만듭니다
description.spanish: Realiza cualquier fusión.
description.schinese: 完成任意融合
description.tchinese: 執行任何融合
description.russian: Выполнить любое слияние.
description.japanese: どんなフュージョンも可能
description.turkish: Herhangi bir füzyon gerçekleştir
description.brazilian: Realize qualquer fusão.
description.latam: Realiza cualquier fusión.

displayName.latam: La caja que te la raja

description.english: Prevent the Prism Containment Chest from being stolen
description.german: Verhindere, dass die Prisma-Eindämmungskiste gestohlen wird.
description.french: Empêche le Coffre de confinement de Prisme d'être volé.
description.italian: Impedisci il furto dello scrigno di contenimento prismatico
description.koreana: 프리즘 무력화 상자를 도둑맞지 않도록 수비합니다
description.spanish: Impide que roben el cofre de contención de prismas.
description.schinese: 防止棱镜收容箱被偷走
description.tchinese: 防止棱晶抑制盒被偷走
description.russian: Не дать украсть ящик сдерживания призмы.
description.japanese: プリズム格納箱が盗まれるのを防ぐ
description.turkish: Prizma Muhafaza Sandığının çalınmasına engel ol
description.brazilian: Evite que o Baú de Contenção de Prisma seja roubado.
description.latam: Impide que se roben el Cofre de Contención de Prismas.

description.english: Protect your teammate from Demantoid
description.german: Schütze dein Teammitglied vor Demantoid.
description.french: Protège ta coéquipière face à Démantoïde.
description.italian: Proteggi la tua compagna da Demantoid
description.koreana: 데만토이드로부터 팀원을 보호합니다
description.spanish: Protege a tus compañeros de Demantoide.
description.schinese: 保护你的队友免受翠榴石伤害
description.tchinese: 保護隊友抵禦翠榴石
description.russian: Защитить члена команды от Демантоид.
description.japanese: デマントイドからチームメイトを守る
description.turkish: Takım arkadaşlarını Demantoid'den koru
description.brazilian: Proteja sua companheira de equipe da Demantoid.
description.latam: Protege de Demantoide a tu compañero de equipo.

description.english: Establish Democracy in a formerly-conquered Gem colony. It's always important to vote!
description.german: Richte in einer eroberten Gem-Kolonie eine Demokratie ein. Es ist immer wichtig, wählen zu gehen!
description.french: Établis une démocratie dans une ancienne colonie de Gemme. Voter, c'est primordial !
description.italian: Instaura la democrazia in una ex colonia delle Gemme. Votare è importante!
description.koreana: 젬 식민지였던 곳에 민주주의를 꽃피웁니다. 투표는 언제나 소중합니다!
description.spanish: Establece la democracia en una colonia anteriormente conquistada por Gemas. ¡El voto es superimportante!
description.schinese: 在曾被征服的宝石人殖民地上建立民主制。投票可是非常重要哦！
description.tchinese: 在一個原先被征服的寶石殖民地建立民主。投票永遠都很重要！
description.russian: Установить демократию в бывшей покоренной колонии самоцветов. Голосуйте!
description.japanese: 以前に征服されていたジェムの居留地で民主主義を確立する。投票することは重要だ！
description.turkish: Önceden ele geçirilmiş olan bir Mücevher kolonisine Demokrasi götür. Oy vermek her zaman önemlidir!
description.brazilian: Estabeleça a democracia em uma colônia de Gems anteriormente conquistada. É sempre importante votar!
description.latam: Establece la democracia en una colonia de Gemas anteriormente conquistada. ¡Siempre es importante votar!

displayName.japanese: クッキーキャットの欠陥商品回収

description.english: Complete any Chapter 3 battle stage without using any items.
description.german: Schließe eine beliebige Kampfstufe in Kapitel 3 ohne Gegenstände ab.
description.french: Termine un niveau avec des combats du chapitre 3 sans utiliser le moindre objet.
description.italian: Completa la battaglia del capitolo 3 senza usare oggetti
description.koreana: 아무 아이템도 쓰지 말고 챕터 3 전투 스테이지를 클리어합니다.
description.spanish: Completa cualquier fase de combate del Capítulo 3 sin usar ningún objeto.
description.schinese: 不使用任何物品，通关第3章任意战斗关卡。
description.tchinese: 不使用任何道具完成任何第3章戰鬥關卡。
description.russian: Завершить любой боевой этап главы 3, не используя никаких предметов.
description.japanese: アイテムを使わずに第3章の戦闘ステージをクリアする
description.turkish: Bölüm 3 savaşlarından birini hiç savaş malzemesi kullanmadan tamamla
description.brazilian: Complete qualquer fase de batalha do Capítulo 3 sem usar nenhum item.
description.latam: Completa cualquier escenario de batalla del Capítulo 3 sin usar elementos.

description.english: Complete 10 battles with both Amethyst and Peridot in your party
description.german: Schließe 10 Kämpfe mit Amethyst und Peridot im Team ab.
description.french: Termine 10 batailles avec Améthyste et Péridot dans ton équipe
description.italian: Completa 10 battaglie con Ametista e Peridot nel gruppo
description.koreana: 에머시스트, 페리도트와 파티를 맺어 전투를 10회 완료하세요
description.spanish: Completa 10 batallas con Amatista y Peridoto en tu grupo.
description.schinese: 宝卫队中同时带有紫水晶和橄榄石，完成10场战斗
description.tchinese: 隊伍中同時有超紫晶和橄欖石的狀態下完成10場戰鬥
description.russian: Провести 10 боев с Аметист и Перидот в своей команде.
description.japanese: パーティーにアメジストとペリドットの両方を入れて、バトルを10個クリアする
description.turkish: Grubunda Amethyst ve Peridot varken 10 savaşı tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua 10 batalhas com Ametista e Peridot no seu grupo.
description.latam: Completa 10 batallas con Amatista y Peridot en tu grupo.

description.english: Use Peridot's teamwork ability to summon a loyal friend
description.german: Verwende Peridots Teamarbeitsfähigkeit, um eine loyale Freundin zu beschwören.
description.french: Utilise le pouvoir Travail d'équipe de Péridot pour invoquer une amie loyale
description.italian: Usa l'abilità sinergia di Peridot per evocare una persona fidata
description.koreana: 페리도트의 팀워크 능력으로 믿음직한 친구를 소환하세요
description.spanish: Usa la habilidad de trabajo en equipo de Peridoto para invocar a una leal amiga.
description.schinese: 使用橄榄石的团队合作能力召唤一位忠诚好友
description.tchinese: 使用橄欖石的團隊默契技能來召喚一位忠誠的好朋友
description.russian: Использовать командную способность Перидот, чтобы призвать верного друга.
description.japanese: ペリドットのチームワーク能力で忠実な友人を呼び出す
description.turkish: Sadık bir arkadaş çağırmak için Peridot'un takım çalışması yeteneğini kullan
description.brazilian: Use a habilidade de trabalho em equipe da Peridot para evocar uma amiga leal.
description.latam: Usa la habilidad de Trabajo en equipo de Peridot para invocar a un leal amigo.

displayName.french: Si c'est rond c'est point carré
displayName.latam: Si no vas, no lo verás

description.english: Decipher the mysterious space message
description.german: Entziffere die mysteriöse Weltraumbotschaft.
description.french: Déchiffre le mystérieux message de l'espace
description.italian: Decifra il misterioso messaggio spaziale
description.koreana: 미스터리한 우주 메시지를 해독하세요
description.spanish: Descifra el misterioso mensaje espacial.
description.schinese: 解码神秘的太空信息
description.tchinese: 解讀神祕的太空訊息
description.russian: Расшифровать загадочное космическое послание.
description.japanese: 謎に満ちた宇宙のメッセージを解読する
description.turkish: Gizemli uzay mesajının şifresini çöz
description.brazilian: Decifre a misteriosa mensagem espacial.
description.latam: Descifra el misterioso mensaje espacial.

description.english: Complete a secret Chapter
description.german: Schließe ein geheimes Kapitel ab.
description.french: Termine un chapitre secret
description.italian: Completa un capitolo segreto
description.koreana: 비밀 챕터를 완료하세요
description.spanish: Completa un capítulo secreto.
description.schinese: 完成一个秘密章节
description.tchinese: 完成一個祕密章節
description.russian: Пройти секретную главу.
description.japanese: 謎の章をクリアする
description.turkish: Gizli bir Bölümü Tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua um capítulo secreto.
description.latam: Completa un capítulo secreto.

description.english: Defeat three enemies at once with Peridot's Self Destruct Robonoids ability
description.german: Besiege drei Gegner gleichzeitig mit Peridots robonoider Selbstzerstörungsfähigkeit.
description.french: Bats trois ennemis simultanément avec le pouvoir Robonoïdes en auto-destruction de Péridot
description.italian: Sconfiggi 3 nemici contemporaneamente con l'abilità Robosfere ad autodistruzione di Peridot
description.koreana: 페리도트의 자폭 로보노이드 능력으로 적 셋을 한 번에 물리치세요
description.spanish: Derrota a tres enemigos al mismo tiempo con la habilidad Autodestrucción robonoide de Peridoto.
description.schinese: 使用橄榄石的自毁玻球机能力，一次击败3名敌人
description.tchinese: 使用橄欖石的「自爆人型機器人」技能一次打敗三名敵人
description.russian: Сразить одновременно трех врагов способностью Перидот «Саморазрушение робоноидов».
description.japanese: ペリドットのロボノイド自爆の能力で3人の敵を同時に倒す
description.turkish: Peridot'un Kendini Yok Eden Robonoid yeteneğiyle tek seferde üç düşmanı yen
description.brazilian: Derrote três inimigos de uma só vez com a habilidade Robonoides de autodestruição da Peridot.
description.latam: Derrota a tres enemigos a la vez con la habilidad de Robonoides autodestructivos de Peridot.

displayName.english: Keys are the Key, You See
displayName.french: Les clés, c'est la clé, c'est clair
displayName.spanish: Las llaves son la clave, ya lo verás
displayName.japanese: 鍵こそが鍵、分かるかな

description.english: Unlock every Light Barrier in the Palace of Light
description.german: Öffne jede Lichtbarriere im Palast des Lichts.
description.french: Débloque chaque barrière de lumière du Palais de la lumière.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le barriere di luce del Palazzo della luce
description.koreana: 빛의 궁전의 빛 장벽을 모두 엽니다
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las barreras de luz del Palacio de la Luz.
description.schinese: 解锁光明殿中的每一道光障
description.tchinese: 解開光之宮殿裡的每一道光障
description.russian: Открыть все световые барьеры в Дворце Света.
description.japanese: 光の宮殿内にある、すべての光のバリアをアンロック
description.turkish: Işık Sarayındaki tüm Işık Bariyerlerinin kilidini aç
description.brazilian: Destrave todas as barreiras de luz no Palácio da Luz.
description.latam: Desbloquea todas las Barreras de Luz en el Palacio de la Luz.

displayName.french: D'un bout à l'autre de l'univers

description.english: Unlock and visit every stage
description.german: Schalte jede Stufe frei und besuche sie.
description.french: Débloque et visite chaque niveau.
description.italian: Sblocca e visita tutti gli scenari
description.koreana: 모든 스테이지를 해제하고 방문합니다
description.spanish: Desbloquea y visita cada fase.
description.schinese: 解锁并到访每个关卡
description.tchinese: 解鎖並造訪每一個關卡
description.russian: Разблокировать и посетить каждый этап.
description.japanese: アンロックして全ステージに行く
description.turkish: Tüm aşamaların kilidini aç ve hepsini ziyaret et
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie e visite todas as fases.
description.latam: Desbloquea y visita todos los escenarios.

displayName.japanese: 攻撃済み、保存済み、解放済み

description.english: Liberate the other Prisms
description.german: Befreie die anderen Prismen.
description.french: Libère les autres Prismes.
description.italian: Libera gli altri prismi
description.koreana: 다른 프리즘들을 풀어줍니다
description.spanish: Libera a los demás prismas.
description.schinese: 解放其他的棱镜
description.tchinese: 解放其他棱晶
description.russian: Освободить другие призмы.
description.japanese: 他のプリズムを解放する
description.turkish: Diğer Prizmaları özgürlüğüne kavuştur
description.brazilian: Liberte os outros Prismas.
description.latam: Libera a los otros prismas.

description.english: Fully Level Up all of the Crystal Gems
description.german: Kompletter Levelaufstieg aller Kristalljuwelen.
description.french: Augmente les Gemmes de Cristal au niveau maximum.
description.italian: Aumenta al massimo il livello di tutte le Crystal Gem
description.koreana: 크리스탈 젬 모두를 레벨업합니다
description.spanish: Sube de nivel todas las Gemas de Cristal al máximo.
description.schinese: 将所有水晶宝石人都完全升级
description.tchinese: 升滿宇宙寶衛隊全體的等級
description.russian: Повысить до максимума уровень всех Кристальных Самоцветов.
description.japanese: すべてのクリスタルジェムを完全にレベルアップ
description.turkish: Tüm Kristal Mücevherlerin en üst Seviyeye atlamasını sağla
description.brazilian: Suba o nível de todas as Crystal Gems para o máximo.
description.latam: Sube de nivel completamente a todas las Gemas de Cristal.

displayName.japanese: 完璧なポークチョップ

description.english: Complete the game to 100%
description.german: Schließe das Spiel zu 100 % ab.
description.french: Finis le jeu à 100 %.
description.italian: Completa il gioco al 100%
description.koreana: 게임을 100% 클리어합니다
description.spanish: Completa el juego al 100 %.
description.schinese: 100%完成游戏
description.tchinese: 遊戲完成度達到100%
description.russian: Пройти игру на 100%.
description.japanese: ゲームを100%まで完了する
description.turkish: Oyunu %100 tamamla
description.brazilian: Complete 100% do jogo.
description.latam: Completa el 100 % del juego.

description.english: Defeat two or more enemies with a single use of Connie & Lion's Lion Charge ability
description.french: Bats au minimum deux ennemis avec une seule utilisation du pouvoir Charge de Connie et de Lion.
description.german: Besiege zwei oder mehr Feinde mit einem Einsatz der Aufladefähigkeit von Connie & Löwe.
description.italian: Sconfiggi due o più nemici con una singola attivazione dell'abilità Carica leonina di Connie e Leone
description.koreana: 코니와 라이언의 돌격 능력을 한 번 사용하여 둘 이상의 적을 물리칩니다.
description.spanish: Derrota a dos o más enemigos con un solo uso de la habilidad Carga leonina de Connie y León.
description.schinese: 依靠康妮和粉红狮的猛狮冲击能力，单次击败两名以上的敌人。
description.tchinese: 使用康妮與粉紅獅的粉紅獅猛衝技能，一次攻擊就擊敗兩個以上的敵人
description.russian: Убей двух или боле врагов за раз, использовав способность «Львиный натиск» Конни на Льве
description.japanese: コニーとライオンのライオンチャージの能力を1回使用して2体以上の敵を倒す
description.turkish: Connie ve Lion'ın Aslan Hücumu yeteneğini bir kez kullanarak iki veya daha fazla düşmanı yen
